subtitleNullable: Contains the latitude, longitude of Major Indian Cities(can be used geopandas)
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I was looking for a dataset that will help me to map all the Major Indian Cities using Geopandas but I couldn't find non. This dataset help me to achieve what I was looking for.
This data can be used for choropleth map, foilage map using Geopandas. There was only state value(lat & long), which I found in existing datasets. So I found this dataset.


### Content

This contains all the Major Cities and their respective Latitude and Longitude Values along with the rounded-off population and the exact population


### Acknowledgements

Thanks to Simple Maps for making all this data available in one place, you can find the original dataset here:- https://simplemaps.com/data/in-cities


### Inspiration

You can use this dataset for plotting various features about the Major Indian Cities with the help of Geopandas.
title: Indian City Latitude & Longitude Coordinates
